## AesGcm.encrypt() method

Encrypts the provided data using AES-GCM.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static encrypt(options: {
        additionalData?: Uint8Array;
        data: Uint8Array;
        iv: Uint8Array;
        key: Uint8Array;
        tagLength?: number;
    }): Promise<Uint8Array>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | { additionalData?: Uint8Array; data: Uint8Array; iv: Uint8Array; key: Uint8Array; tagLength?: number; } | The options for the encryption operation. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;Uint8Array&gt;

A Promise that resolves to the encrypted data as a Uint8Array.
